nodes.text: Debnoli was a smuggler and a bounty hunter who frequented Chalmun's Cantina in Mos Eisley. He sought revenge on the Galactic Empire for impounding his ship. From time to time, Debnoli worked with Bron Burs, a former commando from the planet Nentan.

In 0 BBY, the smuggler Gela Yeens, who also worked for Jabba Desilijic Tiure as a debt collector, was searching for him. Debnoli was present in the Mos Eisley cantina when Greedo was killed by Han Solo.
According to a Star Wars CCG fan site, Debnoli was named as an anagram of actor Clint Eastwood's character "Blondie" from the film The Good, the Bad and the Ugly.
